name: Sloanysoft C64 SEUCK Games
description:
Sloanysoft C64 SEUCK Games

These games were made in the 80s on a Commodore 64, using Palace Software's Shoot'Em Up Construction Kit.  I made these back when I was about 11 or 12.  The tapes were found some years later & preserved for posterity as TAP files.

Sloany Vs Reggie

Take the role of me or my mate Reggie as we plod through a load of bad guys that loosely resemble whatever I was into at the time – ninjas, batman, arcade machines, Subbuteo players, Pac-Man etc.

Adult Moolah Nitwit Terrapins

Embarrassing name aside, this is another vertically-scrolling, run-and-gun shooter, this time staring Terrapins, that may or may not bear a striking resemblance to other be-shelled pizza loving reptiles.
